column1: Les Mureaux (French: [le.myʁo] (listen)) is a commune in the Yvelines department in the Île-de-France region in north-central France. It is located in the north-western suburbs of Paris
column2: 35.9 km (22.3 mi) from the centre of Paris.

column1: Les Mureaux is served by Les Mureaux station on the Transilien Paris – Saint-Lazare suburban rail line.

column4: and two senior high schools/sixth form colleges in Les Mureaux.Junior high schools:
